title: ISic000628. Epitaph of Abdalas
body:
Facsimile Images

1D(IS)M(ANIBUS)S(ACRUM)
2ABDALASDOMI
3TIAEDOMITIANI
4MAGISTERMAGNUS
5OVIUMQUIBENEVIX(IT)
6INOFFICIOANN(OS)LXXX

Apparatus criticus

English translation

Sacred to the spirits of the dead; Abdalas, (slave of) Domitia (wife of) Domitian, great master of the sheep, who lived well in his job; eighty years old

commentary
